file.name: httpbis-test.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  title: Check httpbis RFC specifications
  version: 0.0.1
paths:
  /ok-get-delete-without-body:
    get: &request-without-body
      description: Test without body
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
    delete:
      <<: *request-without-body
  /ko-get-delete-with-body:
    get: &request-with-body
      description: Test GET with body
      requestBody: {}
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
    delete:
      <<: *request-with-body
  /ko-204-205-with-content:
      get:
        responses:
          "204": &response-with-content
            description: Unexpected content.
            content:
              application/json: {}
          "205":
            <<: *response-with-content
  /ok-204-no-content:
      get:
        responses:
          "204":
            description: No content.
          "205":
            description: No content.
  /ko-2xx-no-content:
      get:
        responses:
          "200":
            description: Fail with empty content.
            content: {}
          "201":
            description: Fail with undefined schema.
            content:
              application/json: {}
          "202":
            $ref: "#/components/responses/202NoContent"
          "203":
            $ref: "#/components/responses/203NoContent"
          "206":
            description: Partial content.
  /ok-2xx-content:
      get:
        responses:
          "200": &has-schema
            $ref: "#/components/responses/HasSchema"
          "201":
            $ref: "#/components/responses/HasSchema"
          "202":
            $ref: "#/components/responses/HasSchema"
          "203":
            $ref: "#/components/responses/HasSchema"
          "206":
            $ref: "#/components/responses/HasSchema"
  /ok-get-dont-break-undefined:
    get: {}
  /ok-get-dont-break-undefined-responses:
    get:
      responses: {}
components:
  responses:
    HasSchema:
      description: OK.
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            anyOf:
            - type: string
            - type: integer
    202NoContent:
      description: No content.
    203NoContent:
      description: No content.

Error: parse: parse spec: parse operations: paths: /ko-get-delete-with-body: get: requestBody: content must have at least one entry
